attributes.action: Fire the dabs.com marketing manager for being incompetent.
attributes.additional_details:
Fire the dabs.com marketing manager for being incompetent.

Dabs.com is owned by British Telecom therefore their insistence on sending spam to and alienating existing customers has a negative effect on our economy.

I therefore ask that the department for business, innovation and skills empower their marketing team with innovative business skills, or replace them.
